_header: As oft as sighs been in heart true
_description: A Lover’s Plaint — thirteen 8-line stanzas with refrain, ‘So ofte and ofter I sygh for yowre sake.’

BodTan346.First Lines:
As ofte as syghes ben in herte treweAnd cristall teres on dolefull
                    chekes trill…
BodTan346.Last Lines:
…Sith I am wounded with youre yen tweynlete me no lengur
                    sighen for youre sake
BodTan346.Facsimiles:
Robinson,  Pamela. 
             “Introduction.” 
             Manuscript Tanner 346: A Facsimile.
         Norman, OK: Pilgrim, and Woodbridge: Boydell and Brewer, 1980.

MacCracken,  Henry Noble. 
             “Lydgatiana.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         127 (1911): 323-7: 323.

CULFf16.First Lines:
As ofte as syghes ben in herte treweAnd cristall teres on dolefulle
                    chekis tryllEke thoghtes enbrasen newe and neweThe beste of hem that
                    wante of all her will…
CULFf16.Last Lines:
…Sith I am wounded wyth yowre yen tweynlete me no lengur
                    sighen for yowre sake

Beadle,  Richard,  and  Alfred E. B. Owen.

         London: Scolar Press, 1977.
